1.title: New heroes
1.plot: Meet the members of Miniforce and their impressive skills. They work together to protect other animals from the evil villain Nein and his powerful Mechamons.

2.title: New threat
2.plot: Pascal betrays the Miniforce and joins Nein. The Miniforce will use their robots to battle Pascal and his henchmen.

3.title: Attack of spider mechamon
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Fortune of the day
4.plot: Volt becomes uneasy when his horoscope says to be careful of circles. Will his uneasiness get the best of him during the fight with Pio, a Scorpion monster?

5.title: Courage of turtles
5.plot: The tyrant Torres follows Pascal's orders and attacks the turtles. The Miniforce battle Torres but struggle because of his thick shell. The scared turtles stir up courage to help the Miniforce triumph.

6.title: Miniforce and baby iguana
6.plot: Pascal steals a Queen Iguana's egg and passes it along to the Miniforce. They name the baby Bebe, but soon face danger when they have a misunderstanding with the Queen.

7.title: Scary vending machine
7.plot: Animals start fainting from the cans of soda from a Vending Machine Mechamon. Unfortunately, Suzy drinks one too. When the Miniforce find out this is Nein's doing, they come to the rescue.

8.title: Lucy the chef
8.plot: The members eat Lucy's cookies and get upset stomachs. Lucy later finds out it was only because of a Trash Mechamon, but she still feels defeated. As she begins to look past her feelings, she empowers herself to strike the Mechamon.

9.title: There's something about ipas
9.plot: Suzy brings home a stray cat Ipas. Volt falls in love with her, but can she be trusted?

10.title: Hypnotic music
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Attack of medusa
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Fatally delicious candy
12.plot: A Candy Mechamon starts making the animals addicted to candy. The animals fight with one another for more, including the Miniforce.

13.title: Sammy's betrayal: part 1
13.plot: Sammy is affected by a villainous aura. His symptoms get worse after fighting with Pascal. He tries to fight it but he drifts further and further from Suzy and his friends.

14.title: Sammy's betrayal: part 2
14.plot: Sammy fights with his team members as he struggles between Pascal's words and his memories of his team. Through the members' earnest words, Sammy regains his consciousness and they all work together to fight the Mechamon.

15.title: Deadly sweet fragrance
15.plot: A skunk, Violet, emits a scent different from other skunks and becomes an outcast. Pascal persuades her to use her power to attack the Miniforce.

16.title: Battle with vacuum mechamon
16.plot: Chaos erupts when the members have to choose someone in charge of cleaning. Meanwhile, a Vacuum Mechamon appears and sucks up animals with its power. The Miniforce fights back with even greater power.

17.title: Cause of the disease
17.plot: A Faucet Mechamon appears and spreads a disease through a water canal. The Miniforce thinks it's from raccoons. They feel bad when realize it's because of a Mechamon and resolve the situation.

18.title: Shadow in the dark
18.plot: Pascal is working with the bat Vamp to drain animals of their energy. When the Miniforce finds out, they fight Vamp and save the animals.

19.title: Kungfu master cho: part 1
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Kungfu master cho: part 2
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Destined rivals
21.plot: Pascal lures former Miniforce member Hawk to challenge his old rival Sammy. Pascal finally succeeds in capturing Sammy. The rest of the members come to Sammy's rescue.

22.title: Dangerous curiosity
22.plot: Eden is Suzy's next door neighbor. He knows about the Miniforce and wants to expose them. The Miniforce will come to Eden's rescue after Pascal kidnaps him.

23.title: Black miniforce: part 1
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: Black miniforce: part 2
24.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

25.title: Saving dr. Tao
25.plot: Pascal obtains Dr. Tao's specially designed robot, thanks to Ray. The Miniforce will come to resolve their misunderstandings with Ray. However, not before Pascal manages to activate this powerful Mechamon.

26.title: Invincible miniforce
26.plot: Pascal enters the human village with a special Mechamon. Separately, the members of the Miniforce are no match. The four of them will have to combine their powers and merge into one giant robot to defend the village.

27.title: Arrow of the griffon
27.plot: Animals hit by Griffon's arrows are falsely falling in love but will soon grow to hate one another. Pascal and Nein plan to use this to control the world.

28.title: Give our veggies back!
28.plot: A Mechamon appears at night and sucks away all the produce. The Miniforce must defeat it to help the animals who are suffering from hunger.

29.title: Alien jody: part 1
29.plot: Pascal captures and hypnotizes an alien with the ability to imitate opponents' power and weapons. He plans to use the alien's power to get rid of the Miniforce.

30.title: Alien jody: part 2
30.plot: After being exposed to alien radiation, the Miniforce feel weak and can't transform. Only a powerful stone, the Zodiac-nite, can cure them.

31.title: Secret of the crying pollen
31.plot: A Flower Mechamon is spreading pollen that's making everyone cry -- part of Nein's plan to rid the world of laughter and happiness.

32.title: Legend of the pyramid
32.plot: Pascal wakes Apophis from his long slumber in a tomb inside a pyramid and enlists his help in destroying the Miniforce and taking over the world.

33.title: Twin penguin thieves: part 1
33.plot: After twin penguins Penko and Penky are caught robbing Suzy's house, Pascal helps them escape and takes them under his wing.

34.title: Twin penguin thieves: part 2
34.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

35.title: Halloween party: part 1
35.plot: Suzy and her brother go trick-or-treating and end up at Nein's estate. Meanwhile, flying pumpkins begin attacking small animals and humans.

36.title: Halloween party: part 2
36.plot: Nein sends out more pumpkins to attack Bluebell Village. Suzy happens to be at the town center with the Miniforce during the invasion.

37.title: Dangerous smartphone
37.plot: Nein and Pascal scheme to make everyone more addicted to smartphones so no one will have a chance to stop their latest Mechamon.

38.title: Strange dream
38.plot: A Dream Mechamon appears in the forest at night and sends out electromagnetic waves so that animals, even Suzy, can't distinguish dreams from reality.

39.title: Serpent witch: part 1
39.plot: The Miniforce take on the evil and powerful Serpent Witch Silah, who has turned all the squirrels into frogs and captured the Squirrel Prince.

40.title: Serpent witch: part 2
40.plot: The only way to defeat Silah is by using a sword hidden deep inside a cave. The Miniforce and Prince Micah set out to find it.

41.title: Secret of the monster: part 1
41.plot: A legendary protector of animals, the Forest Guardian, gets captured by Pascal and tainted with dark energy. It's up to the Miniforce to save him.

42.title: Secret of the monster: part 2
42.plot: Suzy and the Forest Guardian become friends, but one night, after struggling with the dark power infused in him by Pascal, the Guardian runs away.

43.title: Precious electricity
43.plot: The Electric Mechamon steals all the electricity, causing a blackout in Bluebell Village. Without air conditioning, the heat becomes unbearable.

44.title: Suspicious frog
44.plot: The Miniforce bring a friendly frog named Lana into their home after she's chased by a dog. But Sammy doesn't trust her.

45.title: Shaku, the pirate king: part 1
45.plot: In exchange for a treasure map to the Golden Isles, Pascal asks Shaku the Pirate King and his parrot, Pero, to help defeat the Miniforce.

46.title: Shaku, the pirate king: part 2
46.plot: Pero uses the bracelet he gave Max to turn him against the rest of the Miniforce. Meanwhile, Shaku has returned to attack the village in the forest.

47.title: Ravenous croaker: part 1
47.plot: Pascal infects a crocodile named Croaker with a starvation virus. Because Croaker is devouring everything in the forest, the animals have no food.

48.title: Ravenous croaker: part 2
48.plot: The Miniforce work hard to bring food to the hungry animals in the forest. But Nein has turned Croaker into a monster who will destroy everything.

49.title: Prophecy of the peacock
49.plot: A Buddhist priest named Kao offers the Miniforce five prophecies. Nein gives Pascal the ultimate Mechamon and one last chance to defeat the Miniforce.

50.title: Miraculous courage
50.plot: The Miniforce seek out Kao to ask him more about their destinies. Later, they face off against the giant Truck Mechamon, driven by Nein himself.

51.title: Miniforce, the final battle: part 1
51.plot: After one year with Suzy, the Miniforce prepare to say their goodbyes. Meanwhile, Pascal has evolved into the Miniforce's strongest possible enemy.

52.title: Miniforce, the final battle: part 2
52.plot: Without the Miniforce, Pascal begins to destroy Bluebell Village. The animals of the forest gather together to pray for Volt, Sammy, Lucy and Max.

imdb.title: Mini Force: The Beginning
plot: Four animal superheroes called the miniforce transform into robots to protect small and defenceless creatures from the hands of scheming villains.
